price: 16. Toen zijn Heer hem in de heilige Toewadal tot zich riep?
arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: idh nādāhu rabbuhu bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
